stimulusHtml: Using the ratio test, determine the interval of convergence of the Maclaurin series for g.

features.html: The function g has derivatives of all orders, and the Maclaurin series for g is ∑ n = 0 ∞ ( − 1 ) n x 2 n + 1 2 n + 3 = x 3 − x 3 5 + x 5 7 − ⋅ ⋅ ⋅ .
